item.title: Write Up : KipodAfterFree CTF 2020 - Dweeder

item.title: Write Up : KipodAfterFree CTF 2020 - Shadowstuck
item.description: Ever since PITA™ declared the usage of stack canaries inhumane, we’ve been working on bringing you the latest and greatest in animal-abuse-free stack protector technology. Can you crack it?
